message: I propose a fair split: 90% for me, 10% for you.  Let's end this quickly.
You wanted a quick end, I'll give you a better chance to reconsider. Take it or leave it.
Let's be reasonable. I'll give you 30% this time, but I'm not going any lower.  It's a win-win situation.
I'll meet you in the middle. No more negotiations, take it or leave it.
